title: Are personal statements and personal essays the same thing? - Quora

response.answer_text: they might be. They might not be. Donna Williams gave a good heuristic. I’d look at the requirements of whatever writing is being requested and conforming it to that. Regardless of what it is called.
Not necessarily. A personal STATEMENT usually discusses your beliefs about the given topic. A personal ESSAY tells about something that happened to you and its impact on your life.
